ksrinivas.shapes

Class Rectangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • ksrinivas.shapes.Shape
      • ksrinivas.shapes.Shape2D
        • ksrinivas.shapes.Rectangle

  • public class Rectangle
extends Shape2D
    This class models a Processing-drawable Rectangle.
    Author:
    ksrinivas788

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class ksrinivas.shapes.Shape

        x, y

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Rectangle()
      Creates a default instance of a Rectangle object with all dimensions set to zero.
      Rectangle(double x, double y, double width, double height)
      Creates a new instance of a Rectangle object with the left and right edges of the rectangle at x and x + width.
      Rectangle(double x, double y, double width, double height, java.awt.Color stroke, java.awt.Color fill, float strokeWeight)
      Creates a new instance of a Rectangle object with (x, y) as its top left corner

    • Constructor Detail

      • Rectangle

        public Rectangle()
        Creates a default instance of a Rectangle object with all dimensions set to zero.

      • Rectangle

        public Rectangle(double x,
                 double y,
                 double width,
                 double height)
        Creates a new instance of a Rectangle object with the left and right edges of the rectangle at x and x + width. The top and bottom edges are at y and y + height.
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate of the upper left corner of the rectangle
        y - The y coordinate of the upper left corner of the rectangle
        width - The pixel width of the rectangle
        height - The pixel height of the rectangle

      • Rectangle

        public Rectangle(double x,
                 double y,
                 double width,
                 double height,
                 java.awt.Color stroke,
                 java.awt.Color fill,
                 float strokeWeight)
        Creates a new instance of a Rectangle object with (x, y) as its top left corner
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate of the upper left corner of the rectangle
        y - The y coordinate of the upper left corner of the rectangle
        width - The pixel width of the rectangle
        height - The pixel height of the rectangle
        stroke - The Color object representing the stroke color
        fill - The Color object representing the fill color
        strokeWeight - The width of the stroke

    • Method Detail

      • calcPerimeter

        public double calcPerimeter()
        Calculates and returns the perimeter of the rectangle
        Specified by:

        Returns:

        public double calcArea()
        Calculates and returns the area of the rectangle
        Specified by:

        Returns:

      • isPointInside

        public boolean isPointInside(double x,
                             double y)
        Determines whether the point x,y is contained inside this rectangle
        Specified by:
        isPointInside in class Shape2D
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate of given point
        y - The y coordinate of given point
        Returns:
        boolean whether point (x,y) is inside the rectangle

      • mirrorPoint

        public void mirrorPoint(double x,
                        double y,
                        processing.core.PApplet marker)
        Mirrors the point (x,y) across each side of the rectangle
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate of given point
        y - The y coordinate of given point
        marker - The PApplet used to draw mirrored points
        Postcondition:
        marker.stroke is set to (127, 127, 127)

      • drawDiagonals

        public void drawDiagonals(processing.core.PApplet marker)
        Draws the diagonals of the rectangle
        Parameters:
        marker - The PApplet used to draw diagonals

      • draw

        public void draw(processing.core.PApplet marker)
        Draws a new instance of a Rectangle object with the left and right edges of the rectangle at x and x + width. The top and bottom edges are at y and y + height.
        Overrides:
        draw in class Shape2D
        Parameters:
        marker - The PApplet used to draw the rectangle
